snippet.title: Outlet crash stalls city-bound traffic
snippet.content: A THREE-VEHICLE crash on Hobart's Southern Outlet is expected to cause traffic delays for city-bound commuters. In a statement issued at 7.51am today, Tasmania Police said emergency services were responding to the accident near Proctors Rd at Mt Nelson. A city-bound traffic lane will be blocked to allow the safe passage of emergency crews. There will be delays to city-bound traffic until the scene is cleared. Motorists have been urged to avoid the area if possible. No injuries have been reported.
